desc.en: Connects your intercom with your ioBroker
desc.de: Verbindet deine Gegensprechanlage mit deinem ioBroker
desc.pt: Conecta-se a sua intercomunicação com o seu ioBroker
desc.nl: Verbindt uw intercom met uw ioBroker
desc.fr: Se connecte à votre intercom avec votre ioBroker
desc.it: Collega il tuo interfono con il ioBroker
desc.es: Conecta tu intercomunicador con su ioBroker
desc.zh-cn: 连接你的对讲机与你的ioBroker

2.0.6.en: Updated dependencies to fix security vulnerabilities in depending packages

2.0.5.en:
(@Apollon77) updated testing for Node.js v12 (#25)
(Zefau) updated dependencies

2.0.4.en: (@Apollon77) Core Files/Testing Update and introduce adapter-core (#17) and Update CI testing (#19)

2.0.3.en: added folder .events.latest with states action, twName, userId and userName reflecting the information of the latest event

2.0.2.en: fixed error incorrectly stating a missing token

2.0.1.en: added error stack trace in log debug output

2.0.0.en: added visual timeline of nello events
2.0.0.pt: adicionado visual cronograma de nello eventos
2.0.0.nl: toegevoegd visuele tijdlijn van nello evenementen
2.0.0.fr: ajouté montage visuel de nello événements
2.0.0.it: aggiunto visual timeline di nello eventi
2.0.0.es: añadido línea de tiempo visual de nello eventos
2.0.0.zh-cn: 添加视觉的时间表尼洛事件
